methods.javadoc: Get the name of this category.
methods.name: getName
methods.comment: Get the name of this category.

methods.javadoc:
Get all categories in this category.
@return zero-length array if there are no categories
methods.name: getCategories
methods.comment: Get all categories in this category.

return.comment: zero-length array if there are no categories

methods.javadoc:
Get all data types in this category.
@return zero-length array if there are no data types
methods.name: getDataTypes
methods.comment: Get all data types in this category.

return.comment: zero-length array if there are no data types

methods.name: getCategory
methods.comment: Get a category with the given name.

return.comment: null if there is no category by this name

methods.name: getDataType
methods.comment: Get a data type with the given name.

params.name: name
params.comment: the name of the data type

return.comment: null if there is no data type by this name

methods.name: createCategory
methods.comment: Create a category with the given name.

throws.comment:
if this category already contains a
 category or data type with the given name

methods.name: removeCategory
methods.comment: Remove the named category from this category.

params.name: name
params.comment: the name of the category to remove

return.comment: true if the category was removed

methods.name: moveCategory
methods.comment:
Move the given category to this category; category is removed from
 its original parent category.

throws.comment:
if this category already contains a
 category or data type with the same name as the category param.

methods.name: copyCategory
methods.comment: Make a new subcategory from the given category.

params.name: category
params.comment: the category to copy into this category

return.comment: category that is added to this category

methods.javadoc: Return this category's parent; return null if this is the root category.
methods.name: getParent
methods.comment: Return this category's parent; return null if this is the root category.

methods.javadoc: Get the fully qualified name for this category.
methods.name: getCategoryPathName
methods.comment: Get the fully qualified name for this category.

methods.javadoc: Get the data type manager associated with this category.
methods.name: getDataTypeManager
methods.comment: Get the data type manager associated with this category.
